5

Best Ever Shampoo

This is without doubt the best shampoo I've ever tried. It really does smell gorgeous and I know the smell doesn't make a jot of difference to the performance of the product but it does make it lovely to use. The best thing about it is that it leaves my hair squeaky clean and that's after only one... wash. I don't even have to wash it twice with this shampoo and a little of the shampoo goes a long, long way so the bottle lasts for ages which is a great help these days. Well done Superdrug!

Most Liked Negative Review

3

Lovely scent

This shampoo has a lovely coconut scent and it lathers well and is easy to rinse out, it just leaves my wet hair feeling a little drier than some other shampoos so I feel I need to use more conditioner to counteract it. I love the fact that it's cruelty-free and would be even better if it was formul...ated without SLS.

Product Information

Superdrug Extracts Restore & Smooth Shampoo is formulated with exotic Moroccan Argan Oil and nourishing Amla extract to restore and smooth frizzy, dry and damaged hair.

Features

The formula hydrates hair and helps to smooth away frizz, leaving hair shiny, soft, smooth and detangled.

  • Formulated with Argan Oil & Amla Fruit
  • Smooths frizz
  • Detangles
  • Cleanses hair
  • Revives dullness
  • Increases hair elasticity
  • Restores softness and shine

    Suitable for vegetarians and vegans

    • Warning or Restrictions

    Warning: Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact with eyes, rinse well with clean water.

    Product Specification

    Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, PEG-18 Glyceryl Oleate/Cocoate, Glycol Distearate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Panthenol, Laureth-4, Sodium Formate, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Lactic Acid, Caramel, Tocopherol, Sodium Hydroxide, Phyllanthus Emblica.

    Product code: 792530

    Product Uses

    Apply to wet hair, lather and rinse thoroughly.

    Recyclable

    CAP – Recycle
    BOTTLE – Recycle

    Tips and Advice

    Use with Superdrug Extracts Argan & Amla Conditioner & Mask
